channel.title: What media player(s) do you have installed and which do you prefer?
channel.description:
Title pretty much says it all :) For myself: [i]Installed:[/i]
[ul][li]Windows Media Player[/li] [li]RealPlayer[/li] [li]QuickTime[/li] [li]Winamp[/li] [li]Media Player Classic[/li][/ul]
[i]Preference:[/i] I used to use RealPlayer for everything, but now I use Winamp for audio files, cuz it ownz and for video files i use Media Player Classic, it's great, it plays everything, it's fast because it doesn't have all that crap like special layout and stuff and it's opensource :)

item.title: What media player(s) do you have installed and which do you prefer?
item.dc:creator: @wrolyat wrolyat
item.description:
@wrolyat wrote:

I have windows media player, but it’s messed up and plays “out of bounds” of my monitor (I guess you would call it that.) The actual program is off my monitor to the right and I can’t center it.

Read full topic

[li]Media Player Classic[/li]
[li]Windows Media Center[/li]
[li]iTunes[/li][/ul]

I use Windows Media Player for almost everything now. Although some movies use certain Codec’s, but when I downloaded Media Player Classic, in came with a bunch.
